DEFAULT.question: How to open a fixed deposit using Groww?

DEFAULT.question: How to track the KYC status of FD?
DEFAULT.answer:
Here's how to track the KYC status of your FD:

- Press on â€˜MY ORDERSâ€™ button below

You will be able to view the order tracking screen, which will give you an update on your order status.

DEFAULT.question: How to change my nominee in an FD?
DEFAULT.answer: To change the nominee in case of FDs that are already started, you will have to contact the bank with whom you have an FD directly.

DEFAULT.question: My issue is not listed here.
DEFAULT.answer: You can try searching for your issue. Alternatively you can raise a ticket with us. Our Customer Support champs will help you out in no time!
